Html:
In the basic stat break down is shows my total expertise that I am over the cap but yellow hit shows that I am under cap

sorry if I misplace this post but something isnt adding up
What is your character name and realm so I can load her/him up and check out what is happening please?

The same happens for me, also posted at ElitistJerks, it tries to stack expertise till the tank (front) cap.

Nathrezïm - Zul'jin (Europe)

Your character is looking just fine. Did you perhaps change the boss model so that your percentage time behind the boss is no longer 100%. This will add parries to your hits and thus require more expertise to counter. This is PRECISELY the purpose of the Boss Handler. In fact if you hover the mouse over the Yellow hits figure it TELLS you that this is why its happening.


Please confirm that this is what you did.

You're totally right, mea culpa :p

Ty for the answer Levva
levva my toon name is woogyman and realm is auchindoun still want to stack expertise when I am over cap
What boss option did you pick? What is the "Percentage time behind the boss" set at?
Doesn't mean it didnt touch you, what is it set at?

Uhh.

So I just loaded up your character.  With everything set at default.  Default setting is "100% time spent behind boss"

 

Go check that option, and tell me what its set at.  If its set at less then 100% time spent behind boss, you owe me 3min and 48 seconds of my life back.
